Name: Final Boss
About the game: Final Boss is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you headlong into the story of a guy who meets a nice girl at a party. This girl turned out to be a sexy girl who loves sex very much. In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a guy who met a new girl at a party. She loves to play video games just like he does. This couple very quickly develops a romance that develops into hot sex. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!
